programs.title: Filmmaking Masterclass
programs.description: Comprehensive training in directing, cinematography, and storytelling for aspiring filmmakers.
programs.fullDescription: This intensive program covers every aspect of filmmaking from pre-production to post. Learn from industry professionals and work on real projects that will build your portfolio.
outcomes: Direct a short film from concept to completion

programs.title: Music Production
programs.description: Learn to create, mix, and master professional-quality music in any genre.
programs.fullDescription: From Afrobeats to Amapiano, this program teaches you the technical and creative skills needed to produce chart-topping tracks. Work with professional studio equipment and software.

programs.title: Screenwriting Intensive
programs.description: Master the art of storytelling for film and television with hands-on workshops.
programs.fullDescription: Learn to craft compelling narratives that resonate with African and global audiences. This program combines theory with practical writing exercises and industry feedback.

programs.title: Cinematography Fundamentals
programs.description: Learn the visual language of cinema and master camera techniques.
programs.fullDescription: This hands-on program focuses on the art and science of cinematography. Work with professional cinema cameras and lighting equipment.
